Name: 祭壇の花/Saidan no Hana
About the game: 'Saidan no Hana' is a horror game with puzzle elements. A building that was somewhere, a person who lived somewhere Purify the soul that cannot be lifted. This game has 7 chapters in total, This content can play one chapter. The play time of one chapter is about 20-30 minutes. Chapters 2 to 7 will be sold at DLC.
